channel.title: CVE Feed for Linux Kernel Organization, Inc. -- all

item.title: CVE-2018-1068|2024-08-05T03:51:47.340Z -- linux%20kernel%20organization%2C%20inc. -- linux%20kernel
item.description: A flaw was found in the Linux 4.x kernel's implementation of 32-bit syscall interface for bridging. This allowed a privileged user to arbitrarily write to a limited range of kernel memory.
